entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
